title: Linus was WRONG - GPD Win 3
description: Can the GPD Win 3 replace your gaming PC? Check out the GPD Win 3!  I was Wrong about the Samsung Galaxy S21:  Did Samsung Ruin the Galaxy S21?  Apple's Next Mac :  Why the PS6 Needs to Be Different:  This Camera is INSIDE the Screen - ZTE Axon 20:   Check out Austin on Twitch:  Vibe with Matt on Twitch:  Chill with Ken on Twitch:    Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:
